JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
At Actona Group we are passioned about being the most value-adding global furniture partner. And right now, we need a colleague who wants to join our financial team in ensuring a smooth and efficient operation of the daily procedures.

About the job

As our new Finance Assistant, you will be focused on efficiently executing financial tasks and processes. Your main responsibility is within accounts receivables, ensuring essential master data and following up with customers. Precision and attention to detail are paramount to ensure the accuracy of our financial records.

Your role will also include the following responsibilities:

  • Maintaining debtors and ensuring credit insurance.
  • Handling payments from customers.
  • Communicating with customers.
  • Calculating and processing customer bonuses.
  • Financial registrations and reconciling accounts receivables in our ERP system (Business Central)
  • Ad hoc financial tasks and possibly other tasks in the finance department.


Who are you?

You have a natural detail-oriented approach and thrive working with task where precision and meeting deadlines are key. You have previously worked in a similar position and are comfortable working with digital systems.

Collaboration and teamwork are essential to ensure success and at Actona Group we believe in celebrating success together. It is therefore important that you have a positive attitude and can work both with your team and individually.


We imagine that this will describe you as well:

  • Thriving in a structured and routine-oriented work environment
  • A positive approach
  • Strong attention to details
  • Proactive attitude
  • Educational background in finance or related field (HHX, Finansøkonom etc.)
  • Experience in financial department with digital workflows (experience with Business Central is a plus)
  • Speaks and writes Danish and has an intermediate level in English


Interested? Then don't hesitate to send us an application.

We look forward to hearing from you.

Work location - Holstebro

Start - As soon as possible


What you can expect from Actona Group

  • A dedicated team with good colleagues in our Danish finance team of 6 Finance Assistants referring to a Finance Team lead as well as colleagues in other departments at our head office.
  • You will be part of an informal and flexible work environment where we celebrate successes together.
  • A workplace that takes care of its employees with appreciative care and benefits.

You can also read more about what it is like to be employed at Actona Group here:
https://actonagroup.dk/karriere/moed-et-medlem-af-vores-actona-team

Data protection statement
https://actonagroup.dk/forside/persondatapolitik

Actona Group

Actona Group A/S has a clear vision: We want to be the most value-adding global furniture partner. For the past 40 years, Actona Group has specialized in supplying modern furniture to the world’s leading furniture stores, and our furniture is sold in 90 markets worldwide.

Actona Group is on a sustainable journey. We want to create an even bigger, stronger, and more sustainable company. We will create continued growth and value-adding services for the benefit of our customers and partners. With a sustainable focus, we also want to minimize our environmental impact.

Facts about Actona Group:

  • 2500 employees worldwide and revenue of app. DKK 2,7 billion.
  • Headquarters, showroom and European distribution center in Tvis, Denmark.
  • Furniture productions and local administrations in China, Lithuania, Poland, and Ukraine.
  • Trading company in China.
  • Part of Lars Larsen Group

We accept CVs and applications in Danish. Interviews and most of the daily work will be in Danish.
